overview: Little Richie Bridgestone goes to spend the weekend with his father at his secluded mountain cabin, and witnesses his father being attacked by 'a creature' that the boy recognizes as a werewolf. He tries to convince his mother and his therapist that his father is now a werewolf.
tagline: Possible in this day and age? Those who didn't believe... are dead!
title: The Boy Who Cried Werewolf
